sentences.sContent: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.sCn: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.sContent: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.sCn: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.sContent: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.sCn: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

words.tran: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tranOther: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
